name: Knights of Tartarus (itch)
description:
In Knights of Tartarus, you are a human that is too afraid to take action, too weak to fight against the evils that lurk. You now have to gain the courage and fight or remain in the forest regretting your past. 

FEATURES

  • Explore a beautifully atmospheric world full with secrets and many puzzles.
  • Fight against magic beasts to get money, resources or spells.
  • Customize your character. You can pick to be a fighter or a mage and upgrade skills as you gain levels.
  • With the resources you get from monsters you can craft weapons, boots, accessories, and armor.
  • Great and varied soundtrack.
  • Huge bosses that are difficult but fair.
